inclusion.criterion: women agreed to participate in the study and signed on a consent form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: genetic impairment, Mullerian anomaly, endocrine or metabolic disorders, or a luteal-phase defect
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: diabetes mellitus diagnosed by symptoms of diabetes plus random glucose concentration≥ 200mg/dL or fasting plasma glucose≥ 126mg/dL or hemoglobin A1C≥5.8% or 2-h plasma glucose≥ 200mg/dL during an oral glucose tolerance test
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: previously untreated tuberculosis, as determined by an abnormal chest film in the previous year or a positive tuberculin skin test
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: prednisone therapy during pregnancy for other reasons
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 25-year-old pregnant woman with unexplained RPL, abnormal immunological profile, and age above 25 years. She has no history of recurrent UTI prior to her pregnancy or any other underlying disease.
